article_title: Medtronic, Covidien, And The Health Of The U.S. Tax Code

article_metadata.author: Steve Brozak

og.description: On June 15, Medtronic, Inc. announced its proposed acquisition of Covidien plc (COV) for $42.9 billion in cash and stock.  A joint press release provided some specifics, such as acquisition price, the number of current employees, and the countries where the companies will operate.  The newly combined company plans to [...]
